oai_dc:dc.dc:title: First Methodist Church on Second Street
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First Methodist Church on Second Street, color image.

“First Methodist Church, 204 N. 2nd, the oldest institution in the city of Memphis, was organized in 1826. It has been in continuous operation at the present location since 1832 when the first building was erected.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: First Methodist Church; Methodist churches; churches; downtown; Second Street; religion;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: The Paris Agency, Inc., 2600 Poplar, Memphis, Tenn.
